description: This view filters out invoice data that is not appropriate for member level EHI exports when group billing or claims invoicing is used.

columns.name: INVOICE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the premium billing invoice.

columns.name: INV_BAL_DUE
columns.description: Balance due for the invoice.

columns.name: LAST_INV_AMT
columns.description: Amount of the last invoice for the premium billing account.

columns.name: BAL_FWD_AMT
columns.description: Total balance forward from the last invoice.

columns.name: NEW_ACTV_AMT
columns.description: Total amount for new activity included on the invoice, including new credits.

columns.name: NEW_CHRG
columns.description: Total new charges included on the invoice.

columns.name: THIS_CYL_AMT
columns.description: Total amount of new premium charges for this invoice. This amount does not include retroactive transactions.

columns.name: RETRO_PREM_AMT
columns.description: Amount of retroactive premium on the invoice.

columns.name: PREM_ADJ_AMT
columns.description: Amount of premium adjustments on the invoice.

columns.name: OTHER_ADJ_AMT
columns.description: Amount of other adjustments included on the invoice.

columns.name: TOTAL_PAID_AGAINST
columns.description: Total paid against the invoice to date.

columns.name: OUTSTAND_AMT
columns.description: Amount outstanding for the invoice. This amount includes unused credits associated with the invoice.

columns.name: OUT_NEW_CHRG
columns.description: Outstanding new charges for the invoice. This represents the amount of charge transactions left to be closed in payment posting related to this invoice.

columns.name: OVERPOST_AMT
columns.description: Total amount of overposts that appear for the first time on this invoice.

columns.name: AMT_IN_OPEN_PTS
columns.description: Amount of payment against this invoice that is currently included in uncommitted payment transaction sets.

columns.name: THIS_CYL_APTC_AMT
columns.description: The APTC amount for the current billing cycle.

columns.name: THIS_CYL_LEP_AMT
columns.description: This field contains the amount of the Medicare Part D late enrollment penalty for this invoice.

columns.name: SEC_INV_BAL_DUE
columns.description: The amount due on the secondary invoice.

columns.name: SEC_INV_NEW_ACTV_AMT
columns.description: The amount of charges on the secondary invoice that are new. This includes both the amount for the current cycle, as well as any new charges from retro.

columns.name: SEC_INV_THIS_CYL_AMT
columns.description: The amount of premium charges on the secondary invoice. This does not include retro.
